dcterms:creator: Matthew Loper
Naureen Mahmood
Javier Romero
Gerard Pons-Moll
Michael J. Black
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset of 24,000 human meshes generated from 30 identities and 800 poses, with ground truths available for evaluation and supervised learning.
dcterms:title: SMPL

dcterms:creator: Silvia Zuffi
Angjoo Kanazawa
David W. Jacobs
Michael J. Black
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset of 24,600 animal meshes generated from 41 identities and 600 poses, providing a more challenging dataset with a wider variety of shapes and sizes of animals.
dcterms:title: SMAL

dcterms:creator: Federica Bogo
Javier Romero
Gerard Pons-Moll
Michael J. Black
dcterms:description: A collection of registered human meshes obtained from real 3D scans, consisting of 10 subjects performing multiple motion sequences, allowing validation of models in realistic unsupervised settings.
dcterms:title: DFAUST

dcterms:creator: Bharat Lal Bhatnagar
Garvita Tiwari
Christian Theobalt
Gerard Pons-Moll
dcterms:description: A dataset that includes registered meshes of humans in clothing from real 3D scans, allowing qualitative validation of methods' ability to handle complex unseen topologies.
dcterms:title: MG (Multi-Garment)
